text: 1.2: Ro 16.25; Kor 1.27; 2 T 1.1; 1.9; 1 Pi 1.20Gu mben kurkurarim, mbe khaŋ tɨgɨp havhargip guigira Zisas khothɨgɨp, mbe Fhe Bakɨme rargɨ kɨrim, ana zazera mbara muuŋgiap ki bɨɨŋbɨɨn mben nɨɨnga. Fhe Bakɨme fhum guarara, ana zumgum kha bigi ga muuŋgi, ana fharav mba zazera mbara muuŋgip ki bɨɨŋbɨɨn nzan nɨɨn za suaŋgi. Ana guiguigi guma fhuvara.
